last_episode_to_air.name: The First Challenge
last_episode_to_air.overview: ﻿﻿The game proves to be all about relationships. Two contestants are voted out.  Amidst blossoming romantic relationships, the contestants compete in a Singing Contest. The winning couple is treated to a private concert with a celebrity music guest.

name: Burning Love
overview:
Burning Love is a scripted comedy series which is a web spoof of the television shows The Bachelor, The Bachelorette and Bachelor Pad. Depending on the season, the show either follows a man or a woman who is looking for the perfect mate from a pool of contestants, or has contestants living together in a mansion competing for a cash prize. Ben Stiller is executive co-producer.

Season 1 showcases fireman Mark Orlando as the bachelor. Season 2 of the series, which premiered in February 2013, stars June Diane Raphael reprising her role as season 1 contestant Julie, now the bachelorette given the chance to find the perfect man. Season 3 also premiered in 2013 and starred former contestants from Seasons 1 and 2 competing for a $900 prize rather than for love.

episodes.name: Meet Mark Orlando
episodes.overview: Fireman Mark Orlando arrives at the Burning Love mansion to meet his future wife. Will she be beautiful, smart, ethnic? Only time will tell. One thing is for sure, he's going to have a tough time narrowing it down to one woman. Can't he have two?

episodes.name: Meet the Ladies
episodes.overview: Mark gets to know the ladies in the first cocktail party. The night turns dramatic when the ladies are given the task of making the first cut. Who will it be? Mark is hoping to see the blind girl go.

episodes.name: Bull Riding
episodes.overview: Haley gets the first one on one date. Mark hopes a night at The Saddle Ranch will bring them closer. Haley impresses him with her zest for life and her record bull riding performance.

episodes.name: Belly Laughs
episodes.overview: Mark arranges a group date at a comedy club. The ladies must perform standup in the hopes of winning a hose and a bubble bath date with Mark. Good girl Mandy doesn't want to compromise her values but really wants that hose!

episodes.name: Pool Party
episodes.overview: A pool party seems like the perfect way for Mark to get to know the ladies better, also to get a sense of what they might look like naked. Annie bakes, Titi wiggles, but it's Lexie who comes on the strongest. Will it pay off?

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Mark surprises Agnes by bringing her son, Hershel to meet them at the park. Mark knows Hershel is an important part of Agnes's life and wants to make sure he fits into their family. Hershel is 40 years old.

episodes.name: Skating, Roller Skating
episodes.overview: A fun group date at the roller rink turns dramatic when Julie is forced to confront her past. Vivian also reveals something to Mark that he was not expecting to see. Tim the medic reconsiders his profession.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: In an emotionally charged and unprecedented episode, one lady is sent home for breaking the rules. A heartbroken Mark is not sure he can go on, but a surprise visitor helps him through the storm.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Tamara and Carly compete for a hose on an exercise themed two on one date. Personal Trainer Brock Glencoe helps Mark determine who's most fit. Mark is leaning toward Tamara but will her monkey heart help or hurt her chances?

episodes.name: Homeless No Mo'
episodes.overview: Mark takes the remaining four ladies to build a home for charity. Annie is overjoyed to help. Willow reconnects with an old friend. Carly tries to send Mark a message. Titi must face her deeply intense fear of homeless people.

episodes.name: Meet the Family
episodes.overview: The final three ladies bring their families to the mansion. Titi's father gives Mark more than just his permission to marry her. Carly's mom feels a connection with Mark. But Annie's brother doesn't approve.

episodes.name: Mark's BFF
episodes.overview: Mark brings the final two ladies to the firehouse to meet his best friend, Jay. Mark's heart to heart with Jay is interrupted by a fire. Annie and Carly tag along as Mark and Jay put their lives on the line. Fire is annoying.

episodes.name: Finale
episodes.overview: Mark invites Annie and Carly to spend a romantic night with him. Annie hopes this day is the happiest of her life. Carly feels like she's walking the plank. Mark proposes to the woman of his dreams in this stunning finale.

episodes.name: Hosed Off
episodes.overview: The ladies are back to talk about what it was really like competing for the same man. Mark returns to the hot seat to face the ladies he rejected. Does he have any regrets? Is he still engaged? Don't miss this thrilling reunion episode.

episodes.name: Limo Introductions
episodes.overview: Julie Gristlewhite welcomes the men who will be competing for her heart.

episodes.name: The First Cocktail Party
episodes.overview: Julie enjoys getting to know her guys during a cocktail party until several game changers change the game.

episodes.name: Puppet Show
episodes.overview: Julie treats the guys to a puppet show date during which she loses her cool.

episodes.name: An All American Date
episodes.overview: Julie chooses Zak for an All American date. Robby Z does his best to lighten the mood at the mansion.

episodes.name: Back to School
episodes.overview: Julie brings her remaining guys to visit old friend, Annie, at her school. They are all put to the test in more ways than one.

episodes.name: A Shocking Exit
episodes.overview: Julie's world is turned upside down by a surprise visit from one of her guys.

episodes.name: Happy Campers
episodes.overview: Julie takes her remaining guys on a camping trip. Emotions run high as stunning secrets are revealed. Simon has a breakthrough of his own.

episodes.name: Breakup Special
episodes.overview: Mark Orlando returns to share some shocking news with Burning Love. Bill ever so gently guides him through the emotional trauma of this very personal interview.

episodes.name: Photo Shoot
episodes.overview: Julie takes two guys on a high fashion photo shoot date.

episodes.name: Freestyle Rap Contest
episodes.overview: A rap legend blesses the mansion with his presence to help Julie determine who is the illest of the guys. Another surprise visitor shakes up the game.

episodes.name: Meet the Families
episodes.overview: The remaining three men invite their families to the mansion so Julie can decide which one she would like to join.

episodes.name: Visit From an Old Flame
episodes.overview: An old love returns to the mansion to help Julie determine which guy would be best for her. A beach ball is tossed around.

episodes.name: Proposals
episodes.overview: Julie must choose who will receive her final box.

episodes.name: Out the Box
episodes.overview: In "Out the Box," Bill Tundle hosts this special recap episode. He catches up with the guys Julie dumped along the way, and finds out if Julie and her fiancé are truly living happily ever after.

episodes.name: Limo Arrivals
episodes.overview: Your favorite Burning Love stars return to the mansion in the hopes of winning $900.

episodes.name: The First Challenge
episodes.overview: ﻿﻿The game proves to be all about relationships. Two contestants are voted out.  Amidst blossoming romantic relationships, the contestants compete in a Singing Contest. The winning couple is treated to a private concert with a celebrity music guest.

episodes.name: Hugging Contest
episodes.overview: Hormones and tempers flare in a sexually charged challenge.

episodes.name: Blindfolded Singing Contest
episodes.overview: Amidst blossoming romantic relationships, the contestants compete in a Singing Contest. The winning couple is treated to a private concert with a celebrity music guest.

episodes.name: Fruit Run
episodes.overview: A physical challenge is presented. The winners are given the power to shake up the game. Fruit is involved.

episodes.name: Hurtful Questions
episodes.overview: Feelings are hurt as the contestants are forced to play a game of "Hurtful Questions.

episodes.name: Doctor Doctor
episodes.overview: The contestants must compete in a medically themed challenge. Simon and Virginia confront their relationship status.

episodes.name: Wet T-Shirt Contest
episodes.overview: A twist on the traditional Wet T-Shirt contest has the house buzzing. Lexie is pushed to her breaking point.

episodes.name: A Shocking Twist
episodes.overview: Jealousy causes one contestant to go too far.

episodes.name: Pop Culture Contest
episodes.overview: Mark makes a tough decision. The contestants compete in a Pop Culture Contest.

episodes.name: Poetry Contest
episodes.overview: A poetic challenge causes some hearts to soar and some to break.

episodes.name: The Twist Twists Again
episodes.overview: Personal tragedy causes the game to twist again.

episodes.name: Dancing!
episodes.overview: The remaining three couples dance their way to the finish line.

episodes.name: Burn Baby Burn
episodes.overview: The big finale. The winner of the $900 is finally revealed.
